events.name: Lithium-Ion Recycling
events.wd_description: Three main methods are used in lithium-ion recycling.
events.description: Three main methods are used in lithium-ion recycling.

events.name: Pyrometallurgical
events.wd_description: The battery is melted in a hot furnace to recover some of the cathode metal.
events.description: The battery is melted in a hot furnace to recover some of the cathode metal.

events.name: Hydrometallurgical
events.wd_description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.
events.description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.

events.name: Bioleaching
events.wd_description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals, but it is challenging because the bacteria need a substantial amount of time to grow and are easily susceptible to contamination.
events.description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals, but it is challenging because the bacteria need a substantial amount of time to grow and are easily susceptible to contamination.

events.name: Company Cash Flow and Strategy
events.wd_description: Examination of the cash flow situations and strategic decisions of various lithium mining companies, particularly during periods of financial stress.
events.description: Examination of the cash flow situations and strategic decisions of various lithium mining companies, particularly during periods of financial stress.

events.name: Cash Flow Analysis
events.wd_description: Analysis of the cash flow situations of various lithium mining companies, particularly during periods of financial stress.
events.description: Analysis of the cash flow situations of various lithium mining companies, particularly during periods of financial stress.

events.name: Strategic Decisions
events.wd_description: Strategic decisions made by lithium mining companies in response to cash flow challenges and market conditions.
events.description: Strategic decisions made by lithium mining companies in response to cash flow challenges and market conditions.
